name: Xyz Entrust
description: Add 1 "Armored Xyz" card from your Deck or GY to your hand, then you can make up to 2 face-up monsters you control become all Level 3 or all Level 5, until the end of this turn. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Xyz Monster Card treated as an Equip Card in your Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it. You can only activate 1 "Xyz Entrust" per turn.
